metadata.title: CVE-2025-0411 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
[7-Zip Mark-of-the-Web Bypass Vulnerability]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2025-0411` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

p7zip - 16.02+transitional.1
p7zip-full - 16.02+transitional.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 7zip package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
p7zip package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '16.02+transitional.1').
